articles.title: UK's Rishi Sunak, Health Minister Quit In Huge Crisis For Boris Johnson
articles.description: UK Finance Minister Rishi Sunak and Health Secretary Sajid Javid resigned on Tuesday, plunging Prime Minister Boris Johnson's government into crisis.
articles.content:

articles.description: A Vastu exponent from Karnataka who goes by the name Chandrashekhar Guruji has been stabbed to death in full public view at a private hotel in the Hubballi district.

articles.title: SpiceJet flight makes a safe landing in Mumbai after windshield cracks
articles.description: The incident comes on the same day when another SpiceJet flight from Delhi to Dubai had to be diverted to Karachi after the crew observed unusual fuel quantity reduction from the tank.
articles.content: An aircraft of SpiceJet (Flight no SG 3324) flying from Kandla in Gujarat made a priority landing in Mumbai Tuesday after its windshield cracked at 23,000 feet altitude, said a SpiceJet spokesperson.… [+1311 chars]
